Q.1. WHAT IS YOUR ARMY RANK OR GRADE*  1. PRIVATE 2. PRIVATE FIRST CLASS 3. TECHNICIAN 5TH GRADE OR CORPORAL 4. TECHNICIAN 4TH GRADE OR SERGEANT 5. TECHNICIAN 3RD GRADE OR STAFF SERGEANT 6. TECHNICAL SERGEANT 7. MASTER SERGEANT OR FIRST SERGEANT 0. NO ANSWER

Q.2. HOW OLD WERE YOU ON YOUR LAST BIRTHDAY*  01. 18 YEARS OR LESS 02. 19 YEARS 03. 20 YEARS 04. 21 YEARS 05. 22 YEARS 06. 23 YEARS 07. 24 YEARS 08. 25 YEARS 09. 26 THRU 29 YEARS 10. 30 THRU 34 YEARS 11. 35 YEARS OR MORE 00. NO ANSWER

Q.3. HOW FAR DID YOU GO IN SCHOOL*  1. LESS THAN 6TH GRADE 2. FINISHED 6TH GRADE 3. FINISHED 7TH GRADE 4. FINISHED 8TH GRADE 5. SOME HIGH SCHOOL BUT DID NOT FINISH 6. GRADUATED FROM HIGH SCHOOL 7. SOME COLLEGE BUT DID NOT FINISH 8. GRADUATED FROM COLLEGE 0. NO ANSWER

Q.4. IN WHAT STATE OF THE UNITED STATES DID YOU SPEND MOST OF THE LAST FIVE YEARS OF YOUR CIVILIAN LIFE BEFORE YOU CAME INTO THE ARMY* E. SECTION:  1. NEW ENGLAND 2. MIDDLE ATLANTIC 3. EAST NORTH CENTRAL 4. WEST NORTH CENTRAL 5. SOUTH ATLANTIC 6. EAST SOUTH CENTRAL 7. WEST SOUTH CENTRAL 8. MOUNTAIN 9. PACIFIC 0. NO ANSWER

Q.5. WHERE WERE YOU LIVING MOST OF THE LAST FIVE YEARS OF YOUR CIVILIAN LIFE BEFORE YOU CAME INTO THE ARMY*  1. ON A FARM OR IN THE COUNTRY 2. IN A SMALL TOWN (FEWER THAN 2,500 PEOPLE) 3. IN A TOWN (WITH BETWEEN 2,500 AND 25,000 PEOPLE) 4. IN A CITY (BETWEEN 25,000 AND 100,000 PEOPLE) 5. IN A LARGE CITY (MORE THAN 100,000 PEOPLE) 0. NO ANSWER X. QUESTIONS 6 AND 7 TO BE CODED TOGETHER.

Q.6. ARE YOU SINGLE, MARRIED, DIVORCED OR SEPARATED OR WIDOWED* F. IF MARRIED:  Q.7. WERE YOU MARRIED BEFORE OR AFTER ENTERING THE ARMY*  1. SINGLE 2. DIVORCED OR SEPARATED 3. WIDOWED 4. MARRIED BEFORE ENTERING THE ARMY 5. MARRIED AFTER ENTERING THE ARMY 6. MARRIED, NO INDICATION WHEN 0. NO ANSWER
Q.8. HOW MANY CHILDREN DO YOU HAVE*  1. I,M NOT MARRIED 2. HAVE NO CHILDREN 3. HAVE ONE CHILD 4. HAVE TWO CHILDREN 5. HAVE THREE OR MORE CHILDREN 0. NO ANSWER
Q.9. HOW DID YOU COME INTO THE ARMY*  1. I WAS DRAFTED 2. I VOLUNTEERED 3. I WAS IN THE NATIONAL GUARD 4. ERC - ROTC - RAR 0. NO ANSWER

Q.10. HOW LONG HAVE YOU BEEN IN THE ARMY*  1. 6 MONTHS OR LESS 2. OVER 6 MONTHS UP TO 9 MONTHS 3. OVER 9 MONTHS UP TO 1 YEAR 4. OVER 1 YEAR UP TO 2 YEARS 5. OVER 2 YEARS UP TO 3 YEARS 6. OVER 3 YEARS 0. NO ANSWER

Q.11. HOW LONG HAVE YOU BEEN IN THE CHINA-BURMA-INDIA THEATER*  1. 3 MONTHS OR LESS 2. OVER 3 MONTHS UP TO 6 MONTHS 3. OVER 6 MONTHS UP TO 9 MONTHS 4. OVER 9 MONTHS UP TO 1 YEAR 5. OVER 1 YEAR UP TO 18 MONTHS 6. OVER 18 MONTHS 0. NO ANSWER

Q.12. HOW LONG HAVE YOU BEEN STATIONED AT THIS PARTICULAR PLACE*  1. 3 MONTHS OR LESS 2. OVER 3 MONTHS UP TO 6 MONTHS 3. OVER 6 MONTHS UP TO 9 MONTHS 4. OVER 9 MONTHS UP TO 1 YEAR 5. OVER 1 YEAR 0. NO ANSWER

Q.13. WHAT BRANCH OF THE ARMY ARE YOU IN NOW*  01. ENGINEERS 02. FIELD ARTILLERY 03. QUARTERMASTER CORPS 04. INFANTRY 05. MEDICAL DEPARTMENT 06. ARMORED FORCE 07. SIGNAL CORPS 08. FINANCE 09. COAST ARTILLERY AND ANTI-AIRCRAFT 10. AIR CORPS 11. TRANSPORTATION CORPS 12. ORDNANCE DEPARTMENT 13. CHEMICAL WARFARE SERVICE 14. MILITARY POLICE 15. D.E.M.L. 16. OTHER 00. NO ANSWER X. QUESTION 14 NOT CODED.

Q.15. IN GENERAL, HOW WOULD YOU SAY YOU FEEL MOST OF THE TIME, IN GOOD SPIRITS OR IN LOW SPIRITS*  1. I AM USUALLY IN GOOD SPIRITS 2. I AM IN GOOD SPIRITS SOME OF THE TIME AND IN LOW SPIRITS SOME OF THE TIME 3. I AM USUALLY IN LOW SPIRITS 0. NO ANSWER

Q.16. IF IT WERE UP TO YOU TO CHOOSE, DO YOU THINK YOU COULD DO MORE FOR YOUR COUNTRY AS A SOLDIER OR AS A WORKER IN A WAR JOB*  1. AS A SOLDIER 2. AS A WAR WORKER 3. UNDECIDED 0. NO ANSWER X. QUESTION 17 NOT CODED.

Q.18. SINCE YOU HAVE BEEN AT THIS STATION HAVE YOU BEEN ABLE TO FIND INTERESTING THINGS TO DO ON YOUR OFF-DUTY FREE TIME*  1. I CAN USUALLY FIND INTERESTING THINGS TO DO 2. I CAN FIND INTERESTING THINGS TO DO ABOUT HALF OF THE TIME 3. I CAN VERY SELDOM FIND INTERESTING THINGS TO DO 0. NO ANSWER

Q.19. HOW GOOD A JOB DO YOU THINK THE ARMY IS DOING IN PROVIDING RECREATION AND ENTERTAINMENT FOR THE MEN IN YOUR OUTFIT*  1. A VERY GOOD JOB 2. A FAIRLY GOOD JOB 3. A PRETTY POOR JOB 4. A VERY POOR JOB 0. NO ANSWER

Q.20. DO YOU THINK YOUR OFFICERS ARE DOING ALL THEY CAN TO SEE THAT THE MEN IN YOUR OUTFIT HAVE INTERESTING THINGS TO DO IN THEIR OFF-DUTY FREE TIME*  1. YES, THEY ARE DOING ALL THEY CAN 2. NO, THEY ARE NOT DOING ALL THEY CAN 3. UNDECIDED 0. NO ANSWER X. QUESTION 21 NOT CODED.

Q.22. SINCE YOU HAVE BEEN IN THE CHINA-BURMA-INDIA THEATER, HOW MANY TALKS BY OFFICERS HAVE YOU HEARD ABOUT VENEREAL DISEASE OR SEX PROBLEMS*  1. NONE 2. ONE OR TWO TALKS 3. THREE OR FOUR TALKS 4. MORE THAN FOUR TALKS 0. NO ANSWER
Q.23. SINCE YOU HAVE BEEN IN THE CHINA-BURMA-INDIA THEATER, HAVE YOU SEEN ANY FILMS ABOUT VENEREAL DISEASE OR SEX PROBLEMS*  1. YES 2. NO 3. DON,T REMEMBER 0. NO ANSWER

Q.24. HOW WOULD YOU RATE YOUR OWN GENERAL KNOWLEDGE ABOUT VENEREAL DISEASES*  1. I HAVE COMPLETE KNOWLEDGE OF THE SUBJECT 2. I HAVE A PRETTY FAIR KNOWLEDGE OF THE SUBJECT 3. I DON,T KNOW MUCH ABOUT THE SUBJECT 4. I DON,T KNOW ANYTHING AT ALL ABOUT THE SUBJECT 0. NO ANSWER

Q.25. HOW IMPORTANT IS IT TO YOU PERSONALLY TO KNOW AS MUCH AS POSSIBLE ABOUT VENEREAL DISEASES*  1. IT IS VERY IMPORTANT TO ME 2. IT IS PRETTY IMPORTANT TO ME 3. IT IS NOT SO IMPORTANT TO ME 4. IT IS NOT IMPORTANT AT ALL TO ME 0. NO ANSWER

Q.27. HAVE YOU EVER HAD SEXUAL INTERCOURSE SINCE BEING IN THE CHINA-BURMA-INDIA THEATER*  1. YES, I HAVE HAD SEXUAL INTERCOURSE SINCE BEING IN THE CBI 2. NO, I HAVE NOT HAD SEXUAL INTERCOURSE SINCE BEING IN THE CBI 0. NO ANSWER

Q.28. ABOUT HOW OFTEN HAVE YOU HAD SEXUAL INTERCOURSE SINCE YOU HAVE BEEN IN THE CHINA-BURMA-INDIA THEATER*  1. I HAVE HAD SEXUAL INTERCOURSE SEVERAL TIMES A MONTH, OR MORE 2. ABOUT ONCE A MONTH 3. VERY RARELY 4. I HAVE NOT HAD SEXUAL INTERCOURSE SINCE BEING IN THE CBI 0. NO ANSWER

Q.29. SINCE YOU HAVE BEEN IN THE CBI HAVE YOU BEEN GETTING SEXUAL INTERCOURSE MORE OFTEN, OR LESS OFTEN THAN YOU USED TO HAVE IT BACK HOME*  1. MORE OFTEN THAN BACK HOME 2. ABOUT THE SAME AS BACK HOME 3. LESS OFTEN THAN BACK HOME 4. I HAVE NOT HAD SEXUAL INTERCOURSE SINCE BEING IN THE CBI 0. NO ANSWER

Q.30. WHEN YOU HAVE SEXUAL INTERCOURSE OVER HERE DO YOU USUALLY PAY CASH FOR IT*  1. I ALWAYS PAY CASH FOR IT 2. I SOMETIMES PAY CASH, AND I SOMETIMES GET IT FREE 3. I NEVER PAY CASH 4. I HAVE NOT HAD SEXUAL INTERCOURSE SINCE BEING IN THE CBI 0. NO ANSWER

Q.31. WHEN YOU HAVE SEXUAL INTERCOURSE OVER HERE DO YOU USE A CONDOM (RUBBER)*  1. I ALWAYS USE A CONDOM 2. I USUALLY USE A CONDOM 3. I USE A CONDOM ABOUT HALF THE TIME 4. I SOMETIMES USE A CONDOM 5. I NEVER USE A CONDOM 6. I HAVE NOT HAD SEXUAL INTERCOURSE SINCE BEING IN THE CBI 0. NO ANSWER

Q.32. WHEN YOU HAVE SEXUAL INTERCOURSE HOW OFTEN DO YOU GET A "PRO" (PROPHYLAXIS) AFTERWARD*  1. I NEVER GET A "PRO" 2. I SOMETIMES GET A "PRO" 3. I GET A "PRO" ABOUT HALF THE TIME 4. I USUALLY GET A "PRO" 5. I ALWAYS GET A "PRO" 6. I HAVE NOT HAD SEXUAL INTERCOURSE SINCE BEING IN THE CBI 0. NO ANSWER

Q.33. SINCE YOU HAVE BEEN IN THE CBI HOW MUCH BEER, WINE, OR LIQUOR HAVE YOU BEEN DRINKING*  1. I AM DRINKING MORE THAN BACK HOME 2. I AM DRINKING ABOUT THE SAME AMOUNT AS BACK HOME 3. I AM DRINKING LESS THAN BACK HOME 4. I NEVER DRINK BEER, WINE, OR LIQUOR 0. NO ANSWER

Q.34. WHEN YOU ARE AWAY FROM CAMP, AND HAVE A FEW DRINKS, DO YOU USUALLY END UP BY HAVING SEXUAL INTERCOURSE*  1. I USUALLY HAVE SEXUAL INTERCOURSE AFTER I,VE BEEN DRINKING 2. I SOMETIMES HAVE SEXUAL INTERCOURSE AFTER I,VE BEEN DRINKING 3. I NEVER HAVE SEXUAL INTERCOURSE AFTER I,VE BEEN DRINKING 4. I NEVER DRINK BEER, WINE OR LIQUOR 0. NO ANSWER

Q.35. REGARDLESS OF WHAT YOU HAVE DONE IN THE PAST, DO YOU THINK YOU WILL HAVE SEXUAL INTERCOURSE, IN THE FUTURE, WHILE YOU ARE IN CBI*  1. YES, I PROBABLY WILL 2. I MIGHT, BUT I,M NOT SURE 3. NO, I NEVER EXPECT TO HAVE INTERCOURSE WHILE IN THE CBI 0. NO ANSWER

Q.36. DO YOU FEEL THAT THE LONGER YOU ARE IN THE CBI YOU BECOME MORE INTERESTED OR LESS INTERESTED, IN HAVING SEXUAL INTERCOURSE*  1. I BECOME MORE INTERESTED THE LONGER I STAY HERE 2. MY INTEREST STAYS ABOUT THE SAME 3. I BECOME LESS INTERESTED THE LONGER I STAY HERE 4. I NEVER EXPECT TO HAVE SEXUAL INTERCOURSE WHILE IN THE CBI 0. NO ANSWER

Q.37. WHICH ONE OF THE FOLLOWING IDEAS DO YOU THINK IS THE BEST WAY TO PREVENT THE MEN IN YOUR OUTFIT FROM GETTING VENEREAL DISEASES*  1. GIVE SEVERE PUNISHMENT IF A SOLDIER GETS A VENEREAL DISEASE 2. HAVE A FREE SUPPLY OF CONDOMS FOR THE MEN IN THE OUTFIT 3. GIVE MORE LECTURES ON SEX PROBLEMS 4. HAVE MORE RECREATIONAL FACILITIES 5. PUT "PRO" (PROPHYLAXIS) STATIONS WHERE THEY CAN BE REACHED EASILY 6. SOME OTHER IDEA 0. NO ANSWER

Q.38. IF A MAN GETS A VENEREAL DISEASE AND THE RECORD SHOWS THAT HE DID NOT GET A "PRO" AFTER INTERCOURSE, DO YOU THINK HE SHOULD BE PUNISHED*  1. YES, HE SHOULD BE PUNISHED 2. NO, HE SHOULD NOT BE PUNISHED 0. NO ANSWER

Q.39. THE ARMY SUPPLIES, UPON REQUEST, WHAT IS CALLED A "V-PACKETTE PROPHYLACTIC KIT", WHICH A SOLDIER CAN USE BY HIMSELF AFTER INTERCOURSE. DO YOU FEEL YOU HAVE HAD ENOUGH INSTRUCTION TO USE SUCH AN INDIVIDUAL "PRO" KIT YOURSELF*  1. YES, I KNOW HOW TO USE A V-PACKETTE "PRO" KIT 2. NO, I DON,T KNOW HOW TO USE A V-PACKETTE "PRO" KIT 3. I NEVER HEARD OF A V-PACKETTE "PRO" KIT 0. NO ANSWER
Q.40A. HAVING A CASE OF GONORRHEA (CLAP) IS NO MORE SERIOUS THAN HAVING A BAD COLD*  1. TRUE 2. FALSE 0. NO ANSWER
Q.40B. THE ONLY WAY A PERSON CAN GET SYPHILIS OR GONORRHEA IS TO BE INFECTED WITH THE GERMS WHICH CAUSE THESE DISEASES*  1. TRUE 2. FALSE 0. NO ANSWER

Q.40. A PROPHYLAXIS ("PRO") TAKEN MORE THAN TWO HOURS AFTER SEXUAL INTERCOURSE IS OF LITTLE VALUE*  1. TRUE 2. FALSE 0. NO ANSWER
Q.40F. IF A WOMAN HAS A VENEREAL DISEASE SHE IS CERTAIN TO KNOW IT*  1. TRUE 2. FALSE 0. NO ANSWER
Q.40G. WEARING A CONDOM (RUBBER) DURING SEXUAL INTERCOURSE, AND GETTING A PROPHYLAXIS ("PRO") AFTERWARDS, WILL ALWAYS PREVENT ONE FROM GETTING A VENEREAL DISEASE*  1. TRUE 2. FALSE 0. NO ANSWER
Q.41. HOW MUCH DO YOU WORRY ABOUT GETTING A VENEREAL DISEASE*  1. I WORRY ABOUT IT A LOT 2. I WORRY ABOUT IT SOMEWHAT 3. I DON,T WORRY ABOUT IT AT ALL 0. NO ANSWER

Q.43. OF THE ABOVE SHOWS THAT YOU SAW WHICH ONE DID YOU LIKE BEST*  1. ASSAM FOLLIES (HUMP HAPPY) 2. JOE E. BROWN 3. SWING PATROL ORCHESTRA 4. PAULETTE GODDARD SHOW 5. HEY ROOKIE (YARD BIRDS) 6. I DIDN,T SEE ANY OF THE SHOWS 0. NO ANSWER

Q.44. SOME PEOPLE HAVE SAID THAT SEVERAL OF THE SHOWS LISTED ABOVE HAD REMARKS THAT WERE DIRTY OR IMMORAL. DO YOU PERSONALLY THINK THAT ANY OF THESE SHOWS WERE TOO DIRTY*  1. YES, ASSAM FOLLIES (HUMP HAPPY) 2. YES, JOE E. BROWN 3. YES, SWING PATROL ORCHESTRA 4. YES, PAULETTE GODDARD SHOW 5. YES, HEY ROOKIE (YARD BIRDS) 6. NO 7. I DIDN,T SEE ANY OF THE SHOWS 0. NO ANSWER P. THE RESEARCH UNIT HAS ALSO BEEN ASKED BY ARMY DOCTORS TO STUDY THE ATTITUDES OF SOLDIERS TOWARD THE PREVENTION OF MALARIA. THE IMPORTANCE OF CONTROLLING THIS DISEASE AS A FACTOR IN THE SUCCESSFUL PROSECUTION OF THE WAR IS NOT ALWAYS REALIZED. WE ARE MOST INTERESTED, THEREFORE, IN KNOWING WHAT YOU THINK ABOUT IT.
Q.45. HOW MUCH DO YOU WORRY ABOUT GETTING MALARIA*  1. I WORRY ABOUT IT A LOT 2. I WORRY ABOUT IT SOMEWHAT 3. I DON,T WORRY ABOUT IT AT ALL 0. NO ANSWER

Q.46. REGARDLESS OF WHAT YOU HOPE, DO YOU THINK YOU WILL GET MALARIA SOMETIME BEFORE YOU LEAVE THE CHINA-BURMA-INDIA THEATER*  1. YES, I THINK I PROBABLY WILL GET MALARIA 2. NO, I THINK I PROBABLY WILL NOT GET MALARIA 3. I DON,T CARE ONE WAY OR THE OTHER 0. NO ANSWER

Q.52. IF SOME OF THE MEN YOU KNOW DO NOT TAKE PROPER PRECAUTIONS AGAINST GETTING MALARIA, WHAT DO YOU THINK IS THE MAIN REASON FOR THIS*  1. THEY DON,T KNOW ENOUGH ABOUT WHAT TO DO 2. THEY THINK THEY MAY GET MALARIA ANYWAY 3. THEY DON,T REALLY CARE WHETHER THEY GET MALARIA OR NOT 4. IT IS JUST TOO MUCH BOTHER TO TAKE PRECAUTIONS 5. SOME OTHER REASON 0. NO ANSWER

Q.53. ATABRINE IS A MEDICINE IN TABLET FORM WHICH IS GIVEN TO MEN IN AREAS WHERE THERE IS A LOT OF MALARIA. FROM WHAT YOU HAVE HEARD, DO YOU THINK THAT ATABRINE CAUSES ANY HARM OR INJURY TO THE MEN WHO TAKE IT*  1. YES 2. NO 3. DON,T KNOW 0. NO ANSWER

Q.54. WHICH ONE OF THE FOLLOWING STATEMENTS COMES CLOSEST TO YOUR OWN IDEA OF HOW GOOD ATABRINE IS IN CONTROLLING MALARIA*  1. TAKING ATABRINE IS A SURE WAY TO KEEP FROM GETTING MALARIA 2. TAKING ATABRINE WON,T KEEP YOU FROM GETTING MALARIA, BUT IT WILL KEEP YOU FROM FEELING SICK FOR A WHILE IF YOU HAVE MALARIA 3. ATABRINE IS NO HELP AT ALL IN CONTROLLING MALARIA 4. UNDECIDED 0. NO ANSWER
Q.55. HOW OFTEN DO YOU USE MOSQUITO REPELLENT ON YOUR FACE, HANDS AND CLOTHES AFTER DARK*  1. EVERY NIGHT 2. MOST OF THE TIME 3. ABOUT HALF OF THE TIME 4. VERY SELDOM 0. NO ANSWER

Q.56. WHY DON,T YOU USE MOSQUITO REPELLENT MORE OFTEN THAN YOU DO*  1. I DO USE IT EVERY NIGHT 2. CARELESSNESS 3. NO NEED 4. NOT AVAILABLE 5. BURNS THE SKIN 6. OTHER CRITICISMS 7. ALL OTHER ANSWERS 8. DON,T GO OUT NIGHTS 0. NO ANSWER
Q.57. IF YOU HAVE USED MOSQUITO REPELLENT, HOW LONG DO YOU FIND IT WILL KEEP MOSQUITOES AWAY*  1. 1 HOUR 2. 3 HOURS 3. 4 HOURS 4. 6 HOURS 0. NO ANSWER
Q.58. HOW OFTEN ARE YOUR BARRACKS SPRAYED TO KILL MOSQUITOES*  1. EVERY DAY 2. EVERY FEW DAYS 3. ONCE A WEEK 4. NEVER SPRAYED 0. NO ANSWER

Q.59. IF YOUR SLEEPING QUARTERS ARE SPRAYED EVERY DAY WHAT TIME OF THE DAY IS IT USUALLY DONE*  1. EARLY MORNING 2. MIDDLE OF THE DAY 3. LATE AFTERNOON 4. MY QUARTERS ARE NOT SPRAYED EVERY DAY 0. NO ANSWER

Q.60. WOULD YOU SAY THAT THE SPRAYING IN YOUR QUARTERS IS CAREFULLY DONE OR POORLY DONE*  1. SPRAYING IN MY QUARTERS IS CAREFULLY DONE 2. SPRAYING IN MY QUARTERS IS POORLY DONE 3. MY QUARTERS ARE NOT SPRAYED AT ALL 0. NO ANSWER

Q.61. ARE THE DOOR SCREENS AND WINDOW SCREENS IN YOUR SLEEPING QUARTERS IN GOOD REPAIR NOW*  1. YES, THEY ARE IN GOOD REPAIR 2. NO, THEY ARE IN NEED OF FIXING 3. THERE ARE NO SCREENS WHERE I SLEEP 0. NO ANSWER

Q.62. LAST TIME THE DOOR SCREENS OR WINDOW SCREENS IN YOUR SLEEPING QUARTERS NEEDED REPAIR HOW LONG WAS IT BEFORE THEY WERE FIXED*  1. THE SCREENS HAVE NEVER NEEDED REPAIRS 2. THERE ARE NO SCREENS WHERE I SLEEP 3. ONE WEEK 4. ONE MONTH 5. NEVER 0. NO ANSWER

Q.63. THE LAST TIME REPAIRS WERE NEEDED FOR DOORS, SCREENS OR WINDOW SCREENS IN YOUR SLEEPING QUARTERS, HOW DID THE MEN WHO LIVE THERE GET THEM FIXED*  1. WE REPORTED IT TO THE PROPER AUTHORITIES AND THEY HAD IT FIXED 2. WE DIDN,T REPORT IT FIGURING THAT IT WOULD BE REPAIRED ANYHOW 3. WE FIXED IT OURSELVES 4. THE SCREENS HAVE NEVER NEEDED REPAIRS 5. THERE ARE NO SCREENS WHERE I SLEEP 0. NO ANSWER

Q.64. WHICH OF THE FOLLOWING STATEMENTS COMES CLOSEST TO YOUR OWN IDEA OF HOW THE MOSQUITO BOMB SHOULD BE USED*  1. YOU LOOK FOR THE MOSQUITOES AND TRY TO GET THE SPRAY TO HIT THEM DIRECTLY 2. YOU SPRAY IT ALL AROUND THE HUT OR TENT VERY QUICKLY AND RE-CAP THE BOMB 3. YOU SET THE BOMB IN THE MIDDLE OF THE HUT OR TENT AND LEAVE THE CAP OFF 4. I DON,T KNOW WHAT A MOSQUITO BOMB IS 0. NO ANSWER

Q.65. WHEN THE WEATHER GETS VERY HOT, DO YOU SOMETIMES FIND THAT YOU CAN ONLY SLEEP BY REMOVING THE MOSQUITO NETTING*  1. YES, I HAVE TO REMOVE THE NETTING 2. NO, I DON,T HAVE TO REMOVE THE NETTING 0. NO ANSWER

Q.66. ALONG WITH THE MOSQUITO NET, THE ARMY USUALLY ISSUES A HEAD NET. DO YOU PERSONALLY THINK IT WOULD BE A GOOD IDEA OR A POOR IDEA FOR THE ARMY TO ORDER THE MEN TO WEAR THEIR HEAD NETS WHILE ON NIGHT DUTY TO PROTECT THEIR FACES AGAINST INSECT BITES*  1. IT WOULD BE A GOOD IDEA 2. IT WOULD BE A POOR IDEA 3. UNDECIDED 4. HAVEN,T BEEN ISSUED A HEAD NET 0. NO ANSWER

Q.67. HOW IMPORTANT DO YOU FEEL IT IS FOR YOU TO WEAR LEGGINGS OR MOSQUITO BOOTS, OR TO TUCK YOUR TROUSERS INTO YOUR SOCKS - TO PREVENT MOSQUITO BITES*  1. IT IS OF NO IMPORTANCE AT ALL 2. IT IS OF LITTLE IMPORTANCE TO ME 3. IT IS OF MEDIUM IMPORTANCE TO ME 4. IT IS OF GREAT IMPORTANCE TO ME 5. IT IS ABSOLUTELY NECESSARY TO ME 0. NO ANSWER

Q.68. SUPPOSE A WEAK SICKLY MAN AND A STRONG HEALTHY MAN ARE BOTH BITTEN BY MOSQUITOES CARRYING MALARIA. WHICH MAN DO YOU THINK IS MORE LIKELY TO GET MALARIA*  1. THE STRONG HEALTHY MAN IS MORE LIKELY TO GET MALARIA 2. THE WEAK SICKLY MAN IS MORE LIKELY TO GET MALARIA 3. THEY ARE BOTH EQUALLY LIKELY TO GET MALARIA 4. UNDECIDED 0. NO ANSWER
Q.69A. ALL TYPES OF MOSQUITOES CARRY MALARIA*  1. TRUE 2. FALSE 0. NO ANSWER
Q.69B. MORE AMERICAN SOLDIERS HAVE BEEN PUT OUT OF ACTION BY MALARIA THAN BY THE JAPANESE*  1. TRUE 2. FALSE 0. NO ANSWER
Q.69C. A MAN WHO HAS MALARIA IS NO LONGER FIT FOR SERVICE IN THIS THEATER*  1. TRUE 2. FALSE 0. NO ANSWER
Q.69D. MANY MALARIA CASES COULD HAVE BEEN PREVENTED IF THE MEN HAD WORN THE RIGHT AMOUNT AND THE RIGHT KIND OF CLOTHING*  1. TRUE 2. FALSE 0. NO ANSWER
Q.69E. WHEN A MAN IS BITTEN BY A MALARIA MOSQUITO HE DOES NOT FEEL THE BITE AT THE TIME*  1. TRUE 2. FALSE 0. NO ANSWER X. QUESTION 70 NOT CODED.
